inline-actions.desc: Display actions on same row as content
inline-actions.desc_cn: 在与内容所在的相同行上显示操作

dense.desc_cn: 密集模式；占用更少的空间

rounded.desc: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component
rounded.desc_cn: 为组件的方形应用较小的标准border-radius

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

default.desc: This is where Banner content goes
default.desc_cn: 这就是横幅内容的所在位置

avatar.desc: Slot for displaying an avatar (suggestions: QIcon, QAvatar)
avatar.desc_cn: 用于显示头像的插槽（建议：QIcon、QAvatar）
